name: dpl-dashboard-app
description: *Created with ❤️ by Mike, Michael, Chris, Peter, and Nelson* / *Ruby version 2.3.1* / *Needs Yarn npm package* / *Most customization must be manually done within Client directory* /

scripts.build: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build && npm run deploy && echo 'Client Built'
